verses.name: 1 Kings 4:7
verses.text: And Solomon had twelve officers over all Israel, which provided victuals for the king and his household: each man his month in a year made provision.

verses.name: 1 Kings 4:8
verses.text: And these are their names: The son of Hur, in mount Ephraim:

verses.name: 1 Kings 4:9
verses.text: The son of Dekar, in Makaz, and in Shaalbim, and Beth–shemesh, and Elon–beth–hanan:

verses.name: 1 Kings 4:10
verses.text: The son of Hesed, in Aruboth; to him pertained Sochoh, and all the land of Hepher:

verses.name: 1 Kings 4:11
verses.text: The son of Abinadab, in all the region of Dor; which had Taphath the daughter of Solomon to wife:
